body_html:
"int64" value on x86 is "unsigned" by default

What exactly do you mean by this? int64_t is defined as a "signed integer type with width of exactly 8, 16, 32 and 64 bits respectively". So I still have no understanding of why that change to GetCycleCounterFrequency is necessary

body:
> "int64" value on x86 is "unsigned" by default

What exactly do you mean by this? `int64_t` is defined as a _"signed integer type with width of exactly 8, 16, 32 and 64 bits respectively"_. So I still have no understanding of why that change to `GetCycleCounterFrequency` is necessary
